speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: What the f*** do you want? I'm not in the mood for your crap!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand this might be frustrating. However, I need to verify your identity to proceed. Can you please provide your date of birth?

speaker: Customer
text: Why the hell do you need that? Just f*** off already!

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the inconvenience. I can only assist you if I can confirm your details. Your date of birth, please?

speaker: Customer
text: It's July 15, 1985, you idiot! Now can you just tell me what you want?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. You currently have an outstanding balance of $500. Would you like to discuss payment options?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm not paying a damn thing! You can shove it up your a**!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. If you're facing difficulties, we can explore options together. Let's talk about it.

speaker: Customer
text: I don't need your help! Just get lost!

speaker: Agent
text: I respect your wishes. Should you change your mind, feel free to contact us. Thank you for your time.

speaker: Customer
text: Whatever, just don’t call me again!

speaker: Agent
text: Understood. Have a great day ahead!
